<--- Direction of bitstream
011011100011010100010101011101010 // Middle of previous frame

01111110 // Closing Flag
01111110 // Fill Flag
01111110 // Fill Flag
01111110 // Opening Flag

11000000 // Address field
         // Translates to 00000011, 0x03
         // LAPB DCE -> DTE command or DTE -> DCE response
         // Single-link operation

00110100 // Control field
         // Translates to 00101100
         // [7:5] = N(R) = 1
         // [4] = P/F = 0, No command subframe
         // [3:1] = N(S) = 6
         // Last bit == 0, Information Frame

// Data

00001000

11111010 // Remove bit stuffing --> 1111110

0000100111010001011000000000000000101110011000000000

11111000 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111100

00000000000000001000000110000001000

11111000 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111100

1100000100

11111010 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111110

000100100

11111000 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111100

000

11111001 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111101

100101000101110111010100011000000

11111001 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111101

10000000010101000000000000000000010000000

11111000 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111100

00000000000000000111000000000101100001010000100001100000000010

11111000 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111100

11100100010000000000000000001100

11111001 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111101

00110110001100100111010100110001011100000010110110111101001101100

11111010 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111110
01111100 // Remove bit stuffing -> 0111110

000

11111010 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111110

011110100110000001011100

11111000 // Remove bit stuffing -> 1111100
1011000011110

0110111010100111 // FCS field (16-bit for LAP-B)

01111110 // End of Frame
01111110 // Fill
01111110 // Fill / Start of next frame

// 
// Final decoded L2 SDU, L3-PDU
//
00001000111111000001001110100010110000000000000001011100110000000001111100000
00000000000001000000110000001000111110011000001001111110000100100111110000011
11101100101000101110111010100011000000111110110000000010101000000000000000000
01000000011111000000000000000000011100000000010110000101000010000110000000001
01111100111001000100000000000000000011001111101001101100011001001110101001100
01011100000010110110111101001101100111111001111100001111110011110100110000001
01110011111001011000011110
